experiment

Class Trial

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • experiment.Trial
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Trial
extends java.util.Observable
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class represent a single Trial from a Block. It contains the sentence the subject will have to ear and its parameter inherited from its Block. It is a single child to the Block Class. The SittingManager will interact with this class to assign the order in which to play the trial.
    Author:
    Philippe de SÃ¨ve, Jean-Etienne Salois
    See Also:
    Experimentation, Block, Parameter, SittingManager, Serialized Form

    • Field Detail

      • m_words

        private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> m_words
        The words contained in the trial. These word represent the spoken words in the video file linked with this trial.
        See Also:
        #m_videoFile;

    • Constructor Detail

      • Trial

        public Trial()
        Default constructor should be avoided. The trial should be instantiated with a video file. *
        See Also:
        Trial(java.io.File)

      • Trial

        public Trial(java.io.File videoFile)
        Initialize the Trial with a video file. The words of the trial are extracted from the file using the following method: "word1_word2_word3" => {"word1", "word2", "word3"}
        Parameters:
        videoFile - video file for this trial.
